EmailTemplate.name: PS Regret EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Regret : {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Issue_Reported_By__c},
Thank you for contacting the Partner Support Helpdesk.
We regret not being able to process your request at the moment, as we currently do not offer support for this topic.
Reason for Regret: {!Case.CH_ReasonForRejection__c}
Please be so kind as to reach out to your Nokia Partner Sales Manager {!Account.OwnerFullName} ({!Account.OwnerEmail}) for further assistance
Your understanding is highly appreciated.
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName} Partner Support Desk Email: partner.support@nokia.com
Partner Portal
Copyright 2020 Nokia
Thread Id: {{!Case.Thread_Id}}
